thoughts.title: Product Management Trifecta
thoughts.description: I believe that product managers should speak three “languages”: design, development, and business.

thoughts.title: 4 Tips to Launch a Product-Driven Digital Experience in Retail
thoughts.description: A digital retail store should launch with a focus on a primary user and a unique proposition, start small, and grow incrementally.

thoughts.title: Retailer's eComm Fallacy
thoughts.description: Why retailers often fail when moving or enhancing their business to the digital world.
